- Probabilistic event; and there is a daily cap on the total number of triggers for all players.
- After triggering additional drops, the following behaviors within the copy will be rewarded with additional drops:
   - Killing Bosses
   - Gathering Large Gatherers
   - Planting Large Crops
- Bosses/Large Gatherers/Large Crops also provide high scores.
- Normal monsters/normal gatherers/normal crops already provide enough points to pass the level.

When activating the totem, select the red crystal. The totem will generate one red crystal after a certain period of time.
Manual collection required.

When activating the totem, select the blue crystal. The totem will generate one blue crystal after a certain period of time.
Manual collection required.

When activating the totem, select the green crystal. The totem will generate one green crystal after a certain period of time.
Manual collection required.

Unlock recipes by upgrading the talent tree.
Find the Totem Manager, Anthony, on the left side of the main city and open the totem crafting interface to find the recipe.

Unlock recipes by upgrading the talent tree.
Find the Totem Manager, Anthony, on the left side of the main city and open the totem crafting interface to find the recipe.

Unlock recipes by upgrading the talent tree.
Find the Totem Manager, Anthony, on the left side of the main city and open the totem crafting interface to find the recipe.

Unlock equipment crafting recipes by upgrading the left nodes of the talent tree.
Find the corresponding profession guide and open the equipment crafting interface to find the recipe.
Requires essence from other professions as materials.
You can also buy the materials directly from the shop.
Equipment level greatly influences ability level.

Once the equipment crafting recipe talent node reaches full level (level 2 or above), the equipment reforging recipe will be unlocked.
Find the profession guide, open the equipment reforging interface, and locate the recipe.
Reforging equipment may yield higher quality gear, which has better stats.
Reforging will not retain the enhancement level, so proceed with caution!

Equipment enhancement requires totems as carriers.
Equipment enhancement can increase both the enhancement level and base stats of the equipment.
A level 10 equipment enhancement is equivalent to a level 1 equipment upgrade.
Example: Level 1 equipment +20 = Level 2 equipment +10

Open Time: 20:00 - 20:30
Find the Slime NPC to accept the protection quest. Escort the Slime to the destination to receive a reward.
You may encounter monsters and other players’ attacks along the way, so protect the Slime from threats.
Other players can only use the "Intercept" skill to deal damage to the Slime.
Find the Totem Manager, Anthony, on the left side of the main city and open the totem crafting interface to find the recipe.
